text_block_list.text: That day, I was incredibly worn out. I had spent all day running around the academy helping with preparations for tomorrow's Selection Race.
It was an important race for Uma Musume to display their strength and get scouted. On my way home―I met her.
There were no costumes, microphones, or even an audience. Nobody would think she was in the middle of a Live. But still――
Even though there was no audience, she was performing with all her heart. Illuminated by the evening light――it almost seemed like she was shining.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah……
I didn't stop because I was tired, I stopped because I was fascinated. When I saw her smile, I was filled with renewed vigor.
Unfortunately, I couldn't stay until the end. To thank her for giving me energy, I gave her a hearty round of applause.
And so, on the day of the Selection Race, I was in top condition. I headed to school in high spirits――

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……throat, good. Air Mic, check. Fliers, check. Okay, prepartions complete☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Everyone～, sorry for the wait☆ With a Smart Dash in to your Heart♪ It's Smart Falcon☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Falco's special showcase, is starting now～! Well then, starting with the usual call――

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Wait, aaaaaaaahhhh～～!! You're the one from yesterday……!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yesterday's Falco Fan Club Member #1-san!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: What an amaaaa～zing coincidence☆ I wanted to talk with you!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But, you ended up leaving part way through. It was kind of lonely that you didn't watch until the end but～, thanks for the applause☆

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Ah, Smart Falcon-san!? Once again, you're holding another Live……!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Oh no, I've already been found☆

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: This is the 15th time this month, you know!? I just can't, can't…… get the sparkling and heart-throbbing out of my mind!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ummm～mm, thank you for becoming such a big fan☆ But, getting mad is NG in Falco's book☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: So with that――it's time to escape♪ Alright, you come with me too!
And after getting swept up in the moment, I ended up chasing after, not knowing what was going on……!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Ah!? Wait right theeeeeeere!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huuuuuu～. Now that we've come this far, we should be safe☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: So exhausted☆ ……are you okay? Thanks for coming with me♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Alright, from the top again, it's intro time! I'm the Umadol, Smart Falcon! Call me Falco, okay♪?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: That's right! An Umadol is a new type of Idol☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Running in races like an Uma Musume, dancing their hearts out during Winning Lives…… Just by shining and sparkling, an existence that grants hope to everyone!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: And so, dreaming of becoming the top Umadol, Falco spends her days training from the ground up☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Well, right now I don't have a trainer so, forget a Live, even prospects for races are up in the air… how……ever……?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Huuuuuuuuuh!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Um, could it be that you're…… perhaps you might be moonlighting? As a Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ooooooooh～～!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: No waaay! Seems like everything's finally starting to come up Falco!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: To think that Fan #1 would be a Trainer, what an amaaaa～zingly dramatic development☆ Very Umadol-like～☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: So then, Trainer-san, why don't we hurry up and sign a contract!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah～ don't worry! I have a contract and other important stuff with me! So I can be ready to be scouted at any time, I normally carry them around with me☆
At this rate I'd be strong-armed in to a contract with her……! I can't just enter in to a contract without knowing anything about her!
choice_data_list: At least let me watch you run first!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Gulpity.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ummmm～, by run do you mean～…… um, you mean like in today's Selection Race, right～……?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah～…… yeah, well, you could say that……
choice_data_list: Then I want to see that first

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Uu…… I guess just being forceful wasn't enough……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Uh～～～～………… Shi-!! Shi-Shine☆!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Got it, Falco will do her best☆ So in return…… for today's race, you can't look at anyone else!
……for some reason, it seemed like she was forcing herself to be excited…… when I was about to ask if there was a reason for that―

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Heeeeey～～～! Smart Falcoooooooon!!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Uwah, Sensei, aren't you faster than before!? Well, I'll be leaving first! See ya later～～!
……with all that said, I guess it was almost time to see how this self-proclaimed Umadol could run.
